body.name: TRUEDAYS Area Rug 5x7 Modern Pink Checkered Rug for Living Room and Bedroom Washable Rug with Non-Slip Backing Soft Pink Rug 5x7 Low Pile Checkboard Area Rug Carpet for Indoor Use

climatePledgeFriendly.details: OEKO-TEX STANDARD 100 requires textiles-based products to be tested against a list of 1,000+ chemicals, to limit those which may be harmful to human health. Certification focus: #ProductSafety and #ChemicalsUsed.

features: 【Stylish Design】The modern checkered rug is a must-have for any home that values style and sophistication. This elegant rug features a sleek and sophisticated checkboard pattern in vibrant colors, adding a modern touch to any room it is placed in. Whether you want to enhance your living room, bedroom, or office, it is a perfect choice.

【Ultra-Soft and Durable】The pink area rug is made of premium polyester, giving you a luxurious feel similar to wool, but with the added benefit of being easy to clean and maintain. Its durability means that the checkboard rug can withstand the wear and tear of everyday life, making it a practical and long-lasting decorative addition to any home.

【Easy to Clean】In daily use, a sweeping robot can keep the checkered carpet clean. The 5x7 area rug is machine washable, machine dry, or air dry with no heating setting only. Our pink area rugs are a practical choice for busy households.

【Non-Slip Backing】The TPR backing keeps the checkered rug securely in place, preventing slips and trips, and the anti-slip backing protects your floor beneath from scratches and damage caused by shifting or sliding rugs. With the non-slip backing, you can enjoy the comfort and beauty of a rug without worrying about safety hazards or damage to your flooring.

【Multi Purpose】The area rugs are available in five sizes, it is versatile and can fit seamlessly into any space. The small size is perfect for smaller rooms or as an accent piece, while the pink rug 5x7 is ideal for larger spaces or as a focal point in a room, such as the living room, bedroom, or office.

How to clean the area rug? It can be kept clean with broom or vacuum cleaner during daily use, And the area rug is machine washable. Warm tips: Wash in cold water with mild detergent; Do not use chlorine or bleach; Tumble dry on low heat or lay to air dry. What is the checkered rug material? Is it non slip? The area rug made of soft polypropylene and Thermoplastic Rubber (TPR) backing, which is soft to touch and non slip. If you want to enhance the grip, it is recommended to use with an extra rug pad. Why is the color different from the picture? 1. Different batches may have different colors, which is normal; 2. Due to the light and screen display, the color of the area rug have some chromatic aberration in different environments.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 5, 2024
reviews.reviewText: This thing is amazing. It’s so cute and can’t believe how easy it is to wash!! Just throw it in and it comes out nice and soft. Great purchase. I want another!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 19, 2024
reviews.reviewText: The pattern is printed onto the white rug so if the colored squares are brushed a certain way you can see some white. It’s not super noticeable unless you’re looking for it. I was worried about quality because others said it is basically a throw blanket. I get the analogy because it has the same feel but it does have the backing of a rug. It’s on the thinner side but soft/padded to walk on. It ships folded up in a box but lays down well. Overall, it’s awesome for the price. I’ve wanted a large, trendy styled rug but was not in the position to spend $300+. Would recommend.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Easy to spot clean, soft and thicker than mod “washable rugs” my only complaint will me that the white squares were kinda stained by the other color

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 25, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 3.0 out of 5 stars Shows Dirt Badly
reviews.reviewText: I purchased this as an entryway rug when I saw it was machine washable (it is, but you have to line dry it due to rubber backing). I didn't realize how soft/plush it is- which isn't a bad thing, but not for an entryway where 3 people and 3 pets come and go everyday. Within a couple of days it's showing dirt pretty badly. I ordered a second rug so I can have one clean to put down every couple of days while the other is washing/drying as a remedy but I doubt at that rate they will last even a year, so.. They're nice, soft and cleanable but it just wasn't the best choice for high traffic.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 17, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Very cut spunky Rug
reviews.reviewText: We were so excited about this rug. I will say overall that it is a great rug. It is super soft and durable. The only thing I dont like is one of the corners got a little scroungey after just one wash. It has held up really well though other than that. Its super cute and spunky for a girls room!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 8, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars such a cute rug
reviews.reviewText: This goes perfect in my home office. It completes the room. When I first opened this I noticed it felt more like blanket material from how fuzzy/plush it is. I do like the thinness, and I’m glad it’s going in a low traffic area. It’s not made to be in a high traffic place, but vacuums easily! Even though it came folded in a box, I haven't had issues with the creases not going down yet, so we will see how it keeps flattening out.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 1.0 out of 5 stars Pretty disappointing; can’t vacuum
reviews.reviewText: I didn’t expect this rug to look identical to the photos, but this is pretty disappointing. It has several stains and already looks like it’s been walked on for months. Not really related to the quality, but I tried to vacuum it to help with the fibers laying in different directions and it did not go well. Stuff is already sticking to it and the vacuum (Dyson Animal 3) couldn’t go over it without it getting stuck, even with my bed holding it down. If it hadn’t been almost $100, I wouldn’t complain, but I would not have gotten this rug if I had see this review.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on November 10, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for the Price!
reviews.reviewText: This is a great, stylish rug for the price point!Main points:-soft under your feet-thin, more of a floor covering, doesn’t add much comfort but certainly better than straight tile-doesn’t smell right out of the package-have a small Dyson that I’m somewhat able to vacuum with; however anything more powerful wouldn’t really work.Can’t speak to the longevity, just opened it up. The white under the green squares doesn’t bother me; I knew going into this purchase that I’m not going to get a top knotch rug for $100; but for what I paid for, the size, presentation, and softness is really worth it.5 stars
